readable.title: 2836808985_b26e4ca09e
readable.content: A man in a flannel shirt and black pants sits on a ship looking out through the railing . A man in a flannel shirt sitting behind metal bars . A man sits with his foot on a pole and smiles . A man sitting on the ground props his feet up against the railing . A young man in a plaid shirts sits on the deck of a boat .
